summary: Full-stack web developer with 5+ years of experience in designing, developing, and maintaining high‑performance, scalable web applications using Object-Oriented PHP (7+), JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and SQL (MySQL, MS SQL Server). End-to-end software development lifecycle experience: technical analysis, design, development, unit testing, deployment, and support. Comfortable in Agile/Scrum environments with strong problem-solving skills and the ability to turn complex requirements into reliable, maintainable solutions. Proficient in REST APIs, responsive design, and performance optimization.

points: Technical leadership and enhancement of complex business applications.
Developed application layers (presentation, business logic, data access) in OO PHP 7+, JavaScript, MySQL.
Designed and executed unit tests with PHPUnit; supported acceptance testing.
Integrated and documented REST and SOAP APIs.
Agile team collaboration (Scrum): sprint planning, code reviews, continuous improvement.
Technical analysis and resolution of critical production bugs.
Developed and optimized features in Object-Oriented PHP and SQL.
Contributed to Agile delivery cycles: technical design, iterative development, production releases.
Designed and developed showcase websites and a member management system using PHP 7, JavaScript, MySQL.
Implemented responsive design for cross-browser and mobile compatibility.
Developed web applications and internal tools for process automation.
Managed relational databases and generated reports.
MIT Agency: built a custom CMS on WordPress; coordinated with designers to ensure UI/UX consistency.
RADEEMA: developed an internal application for managing phone allowances and personnel using Java EE, JSF, JPA, iReport Jasper, PrimeFaces, Oracle.

projects.title: REST/SOAP API integration and documentation at ENGIE
projects.context: Modernization of business apps and interoperability with third-party systems.
projects.stack: OO PHP 7+, REST, SOAP, MySQL, PHPUnit, Scrum
results: Integrated and documented APIs, reduced integration time.
Improved traceability and quality via unit tests.
